title: Completely Remodeled Townhome - Granite, W/D, parking
posting_body: ['Be the first to live in this completely updated, 2 bedroom, 2 bath "townhouse style" unit (~900 sq. ft) in a 1960\'s 7-plex.', ' You will be the first tenants in this renovated apartment with granite countertops, subway tile backsplash and 42" maple kitchen cabinets.', 'The bathrooms are all new - tile surround, tub, fixtures and granite vanity top.', 'New flooring throughout.', 'New carpet in the bedrooms and 6 panel doors with new hardware.', 'The bedrooms each fit a queen sized bed nicely, with plenty of closet space with new mirrored doors.', 'The kitchen has a good sized eating area, and opens out to your own private patio.', ' It flows nicely to the living room which comes with an A/C unit.', 'There are two assigned parking spots right in front of your door.', 'Everything you need is within a mile: Target, King Soopers, and Walmart.', "It is on the 20 bus route with easy access to Sloan's Lake (1+ mile), 3/4 mile to light rail, 6 blocks to Crown Hill Open Space Park, 2 blocks to Morse Park Rec.", 'Center and pool, 1 block to Aviation Park.', 'Water, sewer, parking and trash included.', 'Available 8/3.', ' $1650 deposit.', 'Year lease.', 'Qualifications: 600 or above credit score, verifiable take home monthly income 2-3 times the rent, no felonies or evictions.', 'NO SMOKING of any kind.', ' No Pets.', ' Application Fee: $25 per applicant.']
